/* SQL_ID : go.gg.cms.apps.security.findByLoginId */
SELECT u_id.id AS id , u_id.login_id AS login_id , u_id.login_fail AS login_fail , u_id.user_type AS user_type , u_id.status AS status , u_id.exp_date AS exp_date , fn_dec(u_id.name) AS name , fn_dec(u_id.email) AS email , fn_dec(u_id.mobile) AS mobile , u_id.reg_id AS reg_id , u_id.reg_date AS reg_date , u_group.id AS group_id , u_group.group_name AS group_name , getFilePath(u_id.profile_file_id) AS profile_photo FROM tb_user as u_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_user_group as u_group ON u_id.group_id = u_group.id
u_id.status <> 'REMOVED' AND u_id.id = #{id}::UUID
LIMIT 1
